conversion_verification.notes: The 3D transformation is highly faithful, maintaining the architectural intent of the 2D plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric-style projection with consistent wall heights and thickness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is nearly perfect; all rooms, partitions, and wall proportions match the original plan exactly.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture and fixtures (sofa, dining, kitchen appliances, bathroom units) are correctly placed and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean material differentiation; minimal score reduction for some simplified geometric blending in corner junctions.

detected_errors.description: The balcony door orientation is slightly simplified compared to the 2D swing arc.

summary: An exceptionally accurate 3D conversion that meticulously preserves the layout, furniture placement, and proportions of the original 2D floor plan.
